subject: Football
United States Defense and Military Forces
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: A late defensive stop on fourth down helped the Midshipmen win their 10th straight game against Army in front of a crowd of 80,789 that included President Obama.
snippet: A late defensive stop on fourth down helped the Midshipmen win their 10th straight game against Army in front of a crowd of 80,789 that included President Obama.
